message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40.  This gives us both a decent share.  Consider that the value decreases over time so it's best to settle now.
Alice, I understand your concern about the value decreasing over time. However, I believe a 55/45 split in my favor is more fair, considering the game's dynamics. Let's settle this round.

Bob, this is a better split than your previous offer.  We are both losing value with every round and it seems fair to split closer to the middle.  I am willing to accept a little less than my original offer to reach an agreement.
